6) Extra (optional) index files
For a high-level map, use:
https://api.nsgia.com/getfile?key=public-read-2025&path=catalog/search_map.json
7) What to say back to the user
- After health: 'Health OK (MariaDB reachable).'
- After search: 'Found N items. IDs: ...'
- After get: 'Opened item <id>. I see <summary>. Do you want more?'
Why this is simpler
These endpoints are clean HTTPS with query-key auth and embedded JSON in HTML, which
Claude can reliably fetch and parse. Always stick to these routes and flow.
